author: Kiril Nikolaev
title: Elon Musk Looks Foolish as Tesla Cuts Salaries After Dumb Coronavirus Tweet
description: A month ago, Elon Musk tweeted that the panic over the novel coronavirus is dumb. Tesla is cost-cutting and shares nosedived since. The post Elon Musk Looks Foolish as Tesla Cuts Salaries After Dumb Coronavirus Tweet appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• A month ago, Elon Musk tweeted that the panic over the novel coronavirus is dumb.
  • Now, Tesla is implementing cost-cutting measures.
  • Teslas shares have also nosedived since Musks infamous tweet.
